title: Sports Event Calendar
description: Interactive calendar with event creation, sport/date filtering, and LocalStorage persistence. Unit tested with Vitest.

title: FitTracker Mobile
description: Mobile-first fitness app for trainers with client management and goal tracking. RESTful API integration with responsive UI/UX design.

title: FitTracker
description: Full-stack fitness platform with Spring Boot backend, JWT authentication, and PostgreSQL database with CRUD operations.
technologies: Java, Spring Boot, JWT, React.js, PostgreSQL

title: GeoMyWish
description: MERN stack collaborative shopping platform with group management, real-time updates, and MongoDB data persistence.

title: TinderBook
description: Server-side rendered social platform for book lovers with preference matching, Handlebars templating, and JWT authentication.
technologies: JavaScript, Handlebars, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, JWT

title: Space Aircraft
description: Browser-based game with HTML Canvas. Features keyboard controls, collision detection, and score tracking.
